keyword: how many calories are in olive garden breadsticks
title: How Many Calories in Olive Garden Breadsticks?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Olive Garden breadsticks per piece, including carbs, fat, sodium, and serving tips for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in Olive Garden Breadsticks?
assumptions: Standard Olive Garden soft breadstick, baked fresh, lightly brushed with butter/garlic topping; ~38 g each.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and additions like extra butter. Check Olive Garden's menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Olive Garden breadstick has about 140 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant info.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Olive Garden breadstick?
What are the carbs in Olive Garden breadsticks?
faqs.a: About 25 g carbs per breadstick, with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are Olive Garden breadsticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 460 mg sodium per breadstick due to seasoning.

faqs.q: How many breadsticks in a typical serving?
faqs.a: Often 2–4 per meal, so 280–560 kcal total; adjust based on your order.

faqs.q: Can I get lower-calorie Olive Garden breadsticks?
faqs.a: Request plain without butter topping to save ~20 kcal each.
